sources.title: Hide and Bleed | Full Movie | Action Crime Thriller | Balthazar Getty
sources.description:
Hide and Bleed - A violent night sends cycling champ, Rick Van Pelt, into a neon drenched fever dream. Fueled by scotch and paranoia, he confronts Isaac about an affair with his fiancé. A shocking turn of events unveils their scheme to rip off a reclusive art dealer. Eccentric friends, old and new, fail to save Rick from the nocturnal underworld and his demons personified - a renegade detective his only hope.
2021.  Stars: Balthazar Getty, Clint Howard, Nicole LaLiberte

metadata.Plot: One traumatic night unravels the life of a retired cycling champ into a nightmarish fever dream of murder, steroid rings, and assassins. Only a renegade detective can help him survive until sunrise.
metadata.Actors: Balthazar Getty, Clint Howard, Nicole LaLiberte
